name: 初級日文（一）
description: This is an introductory course for true beginners of Japanese. In this course, you will acquire four skills to make basic communication in Japanese.
goals: understand the sound system of Japanese and produce words and sentences correctly
listen to simple conversations by native speakers and understand the contents
make daily conversations such as greetings, shopping, asking directions and more
read and write hiragana and katakana
understand some linguistic differences in kanji usage between Mandarin and Japanese
